mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_purchase_supplier ( supplier_state, supplier_code , supplier_full_name , supplier_abbreviation , supplier_contacts , supplier_contact_number , work_telephone , unit_fax , electronic_mailbox , supplier_remarks , creation_time , unit_address , bank_of_deposit , contact_number , duty_paragraph , bank_account_number , invoice_address, logistics_consignee , logistics_contact_number , postal_code , receiving_address )VALUES ( #{purchaseSupplier.supplierState}, #{purchaseSupplier.supplierCode}, #{purchaseSupplier.supplierFullName}, #{purchaseSupplier.supplierAbbreviation}, #{purchaseSupplier.supplierContacts}, #{purchaseSupplier.supplierContactNumber}, #{purchaseSupplier.workTelephone}, #{purchaseSupplier.unitFax}, #{purchaseSupplier.electronicMailbox}, #{purchaseSupplier.supplierRemarks}, #{purchaseSupplier.creationTime}, #{purchaseSupplier.unitAddress}, #{purchaseSupplier.bankOfDeposit}, #{purchaseSupplier.contactNumber}, #{purchaseSupplier.dutyParagraph}, #{purchaseSupplier.bankAccountNumber}, #{purchaseSupplier.invoiceAddress}, #{purchaseSupplier.logisticsConsignee}, #{purchaseSupplier.logisticsContactNumber}, #{purchaseSupplier.postalCode}, #{purchaseSupplier.receivingAddress} )
mapper.select: SELECT ps.id, ps.supplier_state supplierState, ps.supplier_code supplierCode, ps.supplier_full_name supplierFullName, ps.supplier_abbreviation supplierAbbreviation, ps.supplier_contacts supplierContacts, ps.supplier_contact_number supplierContactNumber, ps.work_telephone workTelephone, ps.unit_fax unitFax, ps.electronic_mailbox electronicMailbox, ps.supplier_remarks supplierRemarks, ps.creation_time creationTime, ps.unit_address unitAddress, ps.bank_of_deposit bankOfDeposit, ps.contact_number contactNumber, ps.duty_paragraph dutyParagraph, ps.bank_account_number bankAccountNumber, ps.invoice_address invoiceAddress, ps.logistics_consignee logisticsConsignee, ps.logistics_contact_number logisticsContactNumber, ps.postal_code postalCode, ps.receiving_address receivingAddress FROM jr_purchase_supplier ps GROUP BY ps.creation_time ORDER BY ps.creation_time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT ps.id, ps.supplier_state supplierState, ps.supplier_code supplierCode, ps.supplier_full_name supplierFullName, ps.supplier_abbreviation supplierAbbreviation, ps.supplier_contacts supplierContacts, ps.supplier_contact_number supplierContactNumber, ps.work_telephone workTelephone, ps.unit_fax unitFax, ps.electronic_mailbox electronicMailbox, ps.supplier_remarks supplierRemarks, ps.creation_time creationTime, ps.unit_address unitAddress, ps.bank_of_deposit bankOfDeposit, ps.contact_number contactNumber, ps.duty_paragraph dutyParagraph, ps.bank_account_number bankAccountNumber, ps.invoice_address invoiceAddress, ps.logistics_consignee logisticsConsignee, ps.logistics_contact_number logisticsContactNumber, ps.postal_code postalCode, ps.receiving_address receivingAddress FROM jr_purchase_supplier ps WHERE ps.id = #{id}
